mapper.insert: insert into tb_user(user_id, user_pw, user_gender, user_nick, user_uuid) values(#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_gender},#{user_nick},#{user_uuid});
mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from tb_user
select b.* from (select a.* from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, u.* from tb_user u join (select @rownum:=0) T order by u.user_no desc) a) b where rownum between #{start_num} and #{end_num};
select user_id, user_nick, user_uuid from tb_user where user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}

select artist_name, artist_key, count(artist_name) as cnt from tb_song where song_key in (select song_key from tb_recommend where user_no = #{user_no}) group by artist_name, artist_key order by cnt desc limit 10
select star_point, count(user_no) as cnt from tb_recommend where user_no = #{user_no} group by star_point order by cnt desc
select count(user_no) as cnt from tb_recommend where user_no = #{user_no}
select count(user_no) as cnt from tb_recommend where user_no=#{user_no}

select distinct r.song_key, s.song_name, s.album_name, s.play_time, s.is_title_song,s.is_adult,s.issue_date,s.album_key, s.album_img, s.artist_name,s.artist_key, r.star_point, r.user_comment from tb_recommend r join tb_song s on r.song_key = s.song_key where r.user_comment is not null and r.user_no = #{user_no} and r.song_key != 0 order by r.recommend_no desc

select distinct r.album_key, a.album_name, a.album_key, a.issue_date,a.album_img, a.artist_key,a.artist_name,r.star_point, r.user_no, r.user_comment from tb_recommend r join tb_album a on r.album_key = a.album_key where r.user_comment is not null and r.user_no = #{user_no} and r.song_key = 0 order by r.recommend_no desc
select u.user_no, u.user_nick,u.user_img,u.user_id from tb_user u join tb_friend f on u.user_no = f.user_no where f.friend_user_no = #{user_no}
select u.user_no,u.user_nick,u.user_img,u.user_id from tb_user u join tb_friend f on u.user_no = f.friend_user_no where f.user_no = #{user_no}
select distinct user_no, user_nick, user_id, user_img from tb_user where user_id like CONCAT('%',#{search_keyword},'%') or user_nick like CONCAT('%',#{search_keyword},'%')
